page.title: 15A SMALL FARM ON BREDON HILL
page.content: I Interviewed my Grandad.He farms{360 {acres}of land.He has been working on the farm for 34 years.He likes feeding the cattle best.At the farm he has bantams,geese,hens,sheep and cattle. The farm is divided into 15 fields. There are sheep in 4 fields and cattle in 3 fields.In the other fields there is corn.On the farm there are tractors and a combine,a bailer,ploughs,seed drills,scoffals,harrows and a sprayer. There are{two other people who work {with him on the farm.}There are also four cockerels on the farm. They plant the corn in June.He feeds the sheep with Rolled Barley,Oats and Grass.He feeds the cattle twice a day,they have more in the evening. He likes working on the farm.Machinery on small farms is old fashioned compared to that used on big farms.
